General.Name: Hexagon Purus ASA
General.Description: Hexagon Purus ASA provides hydrogen type 4 high-pressure cylinders, vehicle systems, and battery packs for fuel cell electric and battery electric vehicles. It offers hydrogen high-pressure vessels and systems; hydrogen high pressure cylinders; hydrogen distribution systems; hydrogen and storage systems for light duty vehicles, light commercial vehicles, ground storage, distribution, rail, bus, medium and heavy-duty vehicles, as well as for aerospace and aviation buses, ground storage, distribution, maritime, rail, and aerospace applications. The company also provides systems for battery electric vehicles and fuel cell electric vehicles. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Ålesund, Norway. Hexagon Purus ASA is a subsidiary of Hexagon Composites ASA.
